subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: In a move that averted a bigger controversy, the Colts announced that the former Ohio State Coach Jim Tressel would not begin working for the team until the seventh game of the season.
snippet: In a move that averted a bigger controversy, the Colts announced that the former Ohio State Coach Jim Tressel would not begin working for the team until the seventh game of the season.
